string.value: This is your second assignment as an informant and you need to ask #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k why the #o1110100#s have suddenly turned so aggressive.

#p1032101# says she's heard that a lot of monsters have been going crazy and that they all seem to have something in common: their strange behavior is tied to an odd puppet. Maybe this too is tied to the puppet? You should eliminate the #r#o1110130#s#k and find a #b#o1110100# puppet#k if you can.

#o1110130##r #a217141##k
#i4032316# #t4032316# #b#c4032316# / 1#k
You gave #p1032101# the #t4032316#. #p1032101# seemed shocked that the rumors were actually true and wanted to find out who was responsible for placing a puppet on the #o1110100#s.

I don't know how you found that out, but that's absolutely correct. Lately, the #o1110100#s from the southern forest have been getting more and more violent, which alarms me. Their personalities have gotten really dark these days…

But from what I hear, this is occuring in many places at an alarming rate, so I looked into the matter a little more, and it seems that they all have something to do with a puppet. A puppet...! This is really getting more and more bizarre by the day.

I don't know if those rumors are true or not, but it may have to do with the recent case of the #o1110100#s. I don't know why you're asking me for the reason behind the sudden violence of the #o1110100#s, but if you're as intrigued as I am, do you want to help me look into this matter?
I want to see if it really is because of the puppets…so I want you to eliminate #r25 #o1110130#s#k and find the #b#o1110130#'s puppet#k if you can.
Thank you. #o1110100# can be found at #b#m100040003##k in #m100040000#. You can enter through the #bhole in the tree where #p1032112# stands#k, so it shouldn't be too hard to find. Thanks in advance.
In that case, there's nothing we can do about it. If you change your mind, let me know. I do need someone to look into the Green Mushrooms…
Wow, did you eliminate all the #o1110130#s already? And did you find the #o1110100#'s puppets?
I thought it was just a rumor…but now it's really scaring me. The puppets are real. We need to know how the the #o1110100# got this puppet. If you are willing to help, then please talk to me.
You have yet to eliminate #r25 #o1110130#s#k and bring back the #b#o1110100#'s puppet#k. Did you get lost finding the monster? #o1110100#s can be found at #b#m100040003##k.
You have yet to eliminate #r25 #o1110130#s#k and bring back the #b#o1110100#'s puppet#k. Did you get lost finding the monster? #o1110100#s can be found at #b#m100040003##k.
